name: Captain Pepe - Hidden objects
description:
If you have a sharp eye, good power of observation and quick reaction, this game is for you.
Children who love to look for and which good perception of similarity will enjoy in this game.

Captain Pepe - Hidden objects have three levels of weight, easy, medium and hard. There is also a level of Icons that shows only the term that is required, suitable for the youngest who still do not know how to read. Each level is limited in time, when the requested term is found as a prize, it takes seconds for the next level.

A game that is desirable to shorten a trip, make it interesting for children, suitable for children of all ages, without violence, you just need to sharpen your eyes and accelerate your fingers.
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
